Sidorovich, do you repair weapons?

You ask about that weapon in the vice? Yes, its a nice weapon. However it needs new parts. So what do you want to repair? I warn you it's not cheap work. The more damage the more expensive it will be. Besides for repairs I need a similar weapons for spare parts, a necessary requirement for repairs. Look in your PDA there is a table of compatible weapons. Look do not give me a unique weapon for spare parts. And also consider the repair time. The more complex the repair the more time it will take. Sometimes takes half a day. I do not repair armor. So?
